channel.title: Client Crashes! Help!
channel.description:
When I start my client and log in the screen turns white... I use hamachi until i have portforwarded and stuff.. Its only for me and my friend (testing and stuff). It worked fine first but sudden it crashes every time. (Only for me my friend can just get on it) Error code: FrazeScape Client is loading... java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "8004b" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ModelLoader.loadArray(ModelLoader.java:45) at ModelLoader.<init>(ModelLoader.java:10) at Class1_Sub4.method115(Class1_Sub4.java:795) at Class116.method1715(Class116.java:726) at Class116.method1702(Class116.java:104) at Class68_Sub20_Sub17.method1181(Class68_Sub20_Sub17.java:429) at Class68_Sub8.method673(Class68_Sub8.java:96) at Class68_Sub7.method670(Class68_Sub7.java:120) at Class61.method598(Class61.java:442) at client.method33(client.java:711) at Applet_Sub1.method30(Applet_Sub1.java:828) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:156) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Error: Class68_Sub27:71 Class89:39 Class114:395 Class61:453 client:711 Applet_Su b1:828 Applet_Sub1:156 java.lang.Thread.run | java.lang.NullPointerException error_game_crash Shutdown complete - clean:true
Help! :confused:

item.title: Client Crashes! Help!
item.dc:creator: @Renzo102 Renzo102
item.description:
@Renzo102 wrote:

When I start my client and log in the screen turns white… I use hamachi until i have portforwarded and stuff… Its only for me and my friend (testing and stuff). It worked fine first but sudden it crashes every time. (Only for me my friend can just get on it)
